text: Pimentel (Pramantèllu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,171 people lived there. Its area is 14.97 km². It is 154 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Pimentel
